settings.title: LEISURE
settings.content: Everyday Eyewear designed for open roads and mellow days.

settings.title: RX
settings.content: Use overlay text to give your customers insight into your brand. Select imagery and text that relates to your style and story.

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewbox="0 0 2160 1105" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewbox="0 0 1000 1590" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">

        fill: url(#pattern);

        fill: #696969;

        font-family: HelveticaNeue, Helvetica Neue;
      }

      .cls-mobile-14, .cls-mobile-7 {
        fill: #e2a829;
      }

        font-size: 18px;
